item.description: Sat (23)-07-2022-20:12 Type: #quote Tags: There’s no such thing as Disciplines. Everything is the Universe Everything is a relationship of things on top of other things that increase the complexity of a system.

item.title: If you only focus on connections that are already made you'll never create something new

item.title: In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible

item.title: The wrong way to organize information is by where you found it. The correct way is by the location you will use it
Your brain is for creating ideas, not for holding tem
